Maggie’s House
Well, it was done wasn’t it? Maggie was now back to being single. Of course talking to Shar about it hadn’t been easy, but it had happened. Of course she had been happy to see earth again, and her aunts. Many hugs were given and now she was home, her childhood home. Tina was in jail which meant the house was now her’s. It was a large home, with a pool in the backyard. Which she was making use of, dressed in a purple bikini Maggie sat by the pool. Her dog mulling around as she lied there. Luke came to sit by her, so she quickly began petting him. “Oh it’s so good to see you boy, I hope aunt Dorothea treated you well.” She said for the fourth time that hour, before picking him up.
Ensign Cas Yardi 26-Apr-21 05:42 PM

It was good, though, that she wouldn't have to be put up in some unfamiliar lodging. She didn't really want to be alone for a good, long while anyway.
